t: Amazon cuts prices on groceries & adds Amazon Saver brand | Raleigh News & Observer
s: September 16, 2024 - Unlike the other price cuts, Amazon Saver products are available for all customers, not just Amazon Prime members. Amazon Saver products include foods such as crackers, cookies, canned fruit, condiments and seasonings. More than 100 items will be added to the brand over time.
